scripts.deploy: shx --silent mkdir -p ../../../publish/web/login && shx --silent mkdir -p ../../../publish/web/login/.next && shx --silent mkdir -p ../../../publish/web/login/node_modules && shx --silent mkdir -p ../../../publish/web/login/.next/static && shx cp -r .next/standalone/node_modules/* ../../../publish/web/login/node_modules && shx cp -r .next/static/* ../../../publish/web/login/.next/static    && shx cp -r .next/standalone/packages/login/.next/* ../../../publish/web/login/.next &&  shx cp -f server.prod.js ../../../publish/web/login/server.js
